mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PARTNER(PARTNERNUM, ID, PARTNEREMAIL, PARTNEREMAILDOMAIN, PARTNERACCOUNT, PARTNERDATE, PARTNERNAME, PARTNERPHONE, COMPANYNAME) VALUES(#{partnerNum}, #{id}, #{partnerEmail}, #{partnerEmailDomain}, #{partnerAccount}, #{partnerDate}, #{partnerName}, #{partnerPhone}, #{companyName})
